data.name: Metalfoes Steelen
data.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Set 1 "Metalfoes" Spell/Trap Card directly from your Deck.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]
Cool iron bodies meet burning metal machines and man/machine combine. Burn up the soul - Metalfoes Fusion!!
